- **/.claude/commands/explore.md** (136 lines modified)
  - Added 4-phase conversational exploration flow
  - Phase 1: Context Loading (patterns, lessons, decisions)
  - Phase 2: Conversational Discovery (what/why/gotchas/tests)
  - Phase 3: Conversation Synthesis & Preview with approval
  - Phase 4: Traditional Approach Generation (fallback)

## Why This Change
The /explore command previously generated static templates without deep understanding of features. This led to incomplete explorations, missed edge cases, and surprises during build. The new conversational approach ensures AI asks clarifying questions about requirements, gotchas, and test intentions before documenting, resulting in higher-quality explorations and better implementations.
